Title: The Re-Education of Molly Singer
Production companies: Warner Davis Company Hemlock Circle Productions
Release: The film was released in theaters and on VOD on September 29, 2023.
Reception: The film has a 25% rating on Rotten Tomatoes based on 16 reviews.  Bobby LePire of Film Threat rated the film an 8 out of 10.  Kate Erbland of IndieWire graded the film a C−.
